radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild basilar lung atelectasis and nodules measuring 1.6 cm in diameter on both adrenal glands, with a density of 35 to 45 Hounsfield units.
Diffuse enlargement of both adrenal glands (maximum dimension, >3 cm) without discrete nodules; the adrenal parenchyma appeared diffusely heterogeneous with minimal contrast enhancement.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: After 9 months of treatment with fluconazole, showed a reduction in the size of the adrenal lesions.

radiographic_examinations.findings: 18F-FDG avidity exclusively in the adrenal glands.
